## Properties

| Property          | Attribute         | Description            | Type     | Default                                                                                                      |
| ----------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `backgroundcolor` | `backgroundcolor` | Store background color | `any`    | `''`                                                                                                         |
| `column`          | `column`          | Set column layout      | `any`    | `3`                                                                                                          |
| `country`         | `country`         | Store country value    | `string` | `''`                                                                                                         |
| `getAPI`          | `get-a-p-i`       | Fetch data API         | `any`    | `'https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/sfactorycorp/v3.1redesign/Prod/Master/js/territory_selector_config.js'` |
| `listlablecolor`  | `listlablecolor`  | Set list lable color   | `any`    | `''`                                                                                                         |
| `mode`            | `mode`            | API fetch mode         | `any`    | `'Get'`                                                                                                      |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                            | Description                                                |
| ------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--country-header-active-color` | Color of active lenguage of country (Defaults to #f8971d). |
| `--country-header-color`        | Color of country header label (Defaults to #666).          |
| `--header-color`                | Color of country list header (Defaults to #ccc).           |
| `--list-container-width`        | width of list-container.                                   |
| `--list-lable-color`            | Color of country list label (defaults to #666).            |
| `--list-link-color`             | Color of country list link (Defaults to #fff).             |
